description:
在考研英语中，写作是比较重要的部分。写作过程中用一些好的英语常用句型可以给自己的作文加分，平时大家可以背诵一些精彩的句子，提高作文水平。

一、开头句型

万事开头难，写作开头很重要，可以是老师眼前一亮。

1. Along with the rapid growth of … , ...has become increasingly important in our daily life.

随着...的快速增长，...在生活中已经变得越来越重要。

2. What calls for special attention is that …

需要特别注意的是…

3. Nowadays, it is generally/commonly believed that..., but I wonder that...

现在，人们普遍认为...，但是我怀疑...

4. There's no denying the fact that…

毫无疑问…

5. Currently, the issue of ...has been brought to public attention.

近来，...的问题已经成为人们关注的焦点。

6. Nothing is more important than the fact that… 

没有什么比这更重要的…

7. What's far more important is that… 

更重要的是…

二、衔接句型

衔接句是可以很好的链接文章的上下部分。

1. Many ways can contribute to solving this problem, but the following ones may be most effective.

虽然有很多方法可以解决这个问题，但下面的方法可能是最有效的。

2. But the problem is not so simple, therefore 

然而问题并非如此简单，所以……

3. There are several reasons for…，but in general, they come down to three major ones.

虽然有几个原因……，但是一般他们可以归结为三个主要的。

4. Similarly, we should pay attention to… 

同样，我们要注意…

5. In this respect, we may as well (say)…

从这个角度上我们可以说

三、结尾句型

文章的结尾是最后部分，会对作文进行最后的总结，结尾会给批卷人留下较深的印象。

1. From what has been discussed above, we may reasonably arrive at the conclusion that...

综上所述，我们能得出如下结论...

2. I will conclude by saying… 

最后我要说…

3. Accordingly/Consequently/As a result, it is not difficult to draw the conclusion that...

因此，不难得出结论...

4. Therefore, we have the reason to believe that…

因此，我们有理由相信…

5. Taking into account all of these factors, we have reached the realization that...

考虑到所有的因素，我们意识到...

6. All things considered, …

总而言之 ，…

It may be safely said that…它可以有把握地说……

7. Therefore, in my opinion, it's more advisable…

因此，在我看来，更可取的是…

8. The data/statistics/figures lead us to the conclusion that…

通过数据我们得到的结论是...

9. All in all, the whole society should pay close attention to the problem of .... Only in this way can we....

总之，全社会都应该密切关注...，只有这样我们才能...
